message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll take the majority, but you'll get a decent chunk too!
I'll take half, it's a fair start!
You're being greedy, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting away with half!
I'll compromise, but don't think you're getting the better deal!
I'm not falling for your tricks, Bob! I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't think you're getting the better end of the stick!
I'm not getting desperate, but I'll try to squeeze out a better deal!
I'm not giving in, Bob! I'll meet you halfway and see if you're willing to compromise!
